name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅳ with Power Up Kit / 三國志Ⅳ with パワーアップキット
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅳ with Power Up Kit" was released in 1994 as an expansion to the 4th release in the series. About 450 officers appear in the game and "Frontier Tribes" have been added as a diplomatic element.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
